body:
Titleticker.js
==============

Long tab titles always get truncated. No more.

---

Include the library:

`<script src="titleticker.min.js"></script>`

Tick on dom load:

`window.titleticker.tick();`

Own that long title.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Titleticker.js
